posts.post_content:
An excellent card, no doubt. Very satisfying to open, and only an uncommon too.  
  
But you can't equip it to [Gaea's Revenge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gaea's Revenge). It can't be targeted by non-green sources - so unless this is green, you can't equip it. Non-green is not 'blue, red, white and black'.
posts.html:
An excellent card, no doubt. Very satisfying to open, and only an uncommon too.

But you can't equip it to Gaea's Revenge. It can't be targeted by non-green sources - so unless this is green, you can't equip it. Non-green is not 'blue, red, white and black'.

posts.post_content: There's a reason they keep reprinting this. Shround and unblockability wrapped up in {5} mana sorcery speed, also nice since the {5} can be paid in installments (casting cost of {3} + equip cost of {2} = {5}). Also, use with infect creatures to prevent removal and keep the poison count going.
